location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 1323/1916 Pt 2 ‘Baluchistan:- Perso-Baluch Frontier. Sale of the Mirjawa-Kwash Telegraph Line.’

mods.abstract: This part contains correspondence relating to the sale to the Persian Government of the telegraph line between Mirjawa [Mīrjāveh] and Kwash [Khāsh] in the Baluchistan province of Persia [Iran]. The principal correspondents are: the Foreign and Political Department of the Government of India; the Agent to the Governor-General, Resident and Chief Commissioner, Baluchistan, F W Johnston.
